about_the_game:
As a concept opposite to "Solo Leveling," this webtoon has become extremely popular among webtoon readers who enjoyed "Solo Leveling." It's the first webtoon IP being primarily developed for PC and console platforms.
You can receive updates about the game by adding it to your wishlist and following it.

Main Story


"Even after 5 years, my level is still 1."
"The Player Who Can't Level Up" follows Kim Gikyu, who awakened as a player with special abilities at the age of 18. The story revolves around his battles with monsters threatening the world. Although chosen to save the world, the protagonist has a unique twist—he can't level up. This intriguing premise, combined with thrilling action and well-crafted episodes, has made the work immensely popular.

The Secrets of the New Gate Uncovered by the Protagonist Kim Gikyu and Main Egos, Lou and El
A new gate emerges that only player Kim Gikyu can enter. Why did the gate choose him? Discover the secrets of the tower found within the new gate!
The dynamic between Lou and El is a bonus!

Gameplay


The First Console-Based Game from a Webtoon IP with Dazzling and Stylish Action
Unlike other games based on webtoon IPs, this one is being developed specifically for console platforms, allowing players to directly experience the stunning actions of the original protagonist, Kim Gi-kyu. Meet the dual-sword-wielding player character, Kim Gi-kyu, and enjoy the thrill of controlling El and Lou in combat.



Diverse Combat Styles Completed by Combining Ego Shards (Perks)
Enjoy strategic combat with various combinations of Ego Shards, which serve as permanent growth elements.
Explore and complete different combinations of Ego Shards through your adventures.

movies.name: The Player Who Can't Level Up - Game Teaser

name: The Player Who Can't Level Up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700K / AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Player Who Can't Level Up is an action roguelite game based on web novels and webtoons of the same name. You can freely combine various combat styles and numerous growth factors to become stronger. Experience unexpected enhancement effects through various random elements.
supported_languages:
English*, Korean*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
